Html:
Hi folks,

    I am trying to make the minor grid lines visible for the WPF Charts. All I was able to do is to show the Major Grid Lines and Minor Tick marks. It would be of great help if anyone made this before. I am trying to implement a Logarithamic Axis. I managed to get the Major axis, minor tick marks and everything but the minor grid lines.

 

Thanks,

Srikanth
